faq2a1: Your nickname is used when you log in to the game and achieve a position in the leaderboards. Feel free to pick any nickname you want, but remember that it has to be unique and a minimum of 5 and maximum of 10 characters. Please, do not use any personal information, like your real name or phone number. Rovio may delete user accounts containing improper language without a warning.
